channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: hugo-demo-development commands basic hugo commands hugo new site quickstart cd quickstart git submodule add https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo "theme = 'ananke'" >> hugo.toml hugo server hugo new content content/posts/my-first-post.md config and deploy baseURL = "https://victor-schumann.github.io/blog-demo-production/" git submodule add -b main git@github.com:victor-schumann/blog-demo-production.git public git add . git commit -m "message" git push hugo Now go to github and publish!
